page.title: 04Fakenham Junior School
page.content: Queen's Road, Fakenham, Norfolk. { {Headteacher:}Mr D Stapleford BA.{ {School Day:}08.55-12.00, 13.20-15.30.{ {The School}is a County Junior School, co-educational, for 7-11 year olds.{ {Pupils}come from Fakenham, Dunton, Hempton, Pudding Norton, Pensthorpe and Toftrees.{Transport:}Pupils from villages come to school by bus or taxi {Meals:}School Cafeteria or packed lunch.{Transfer:}From Fakenham Infant School, Norwich Rd. at 7 plus. To Fakenham High School, Wells Rd. and Field Ln. at 11 plus.{Teaching Staff:} Headmaster and 13 others.{Ancillary {Staff:}3 people.{School Meals Staff:}5 people.{Mid-day Supervisors:}4 people. {Cleaning Staff:}Caretaker and 3 cleaners.{Crossing Patrol:}1 person. {The School building}once held a mixed Infant, Junior and Secondry school.
